Name: anon
Description: Determines whether the user’s username is displayed in the list of currently logged in members.

Name: cp_last_site_id
Description: MSM cookie indicating the last site accessed in the control panel.

Name: csrf_token
Description: A security cookie used to identify the user and prevent :ref:`Cross Site Request Forgery <cross-site-request-forgery>` attacks.

Name: flash
Description: Control panel user feedback messages, encrypted for security.

Name: last_activity
Description: Records the time of the last page load. Used in conjunction with the last_visit cookie.

Name: last_visit
Description: Date of the user’s last visit. Can be shown as a statistic for members and used by the forum to show unread topics for both members and guests.

Name: remember
Description: Determines whether a user is automatically logged in upon visiting the site.

Name: sessionid*
Description: Session id, used to associate a logged in user with their data.

Name: tracker
Description: Contains the last 5 pages viewed, encrypted for security. Typically used for form or error message returns.
